coreAttributes.name: folding fan
coreAttributes.description: An arcane weapon in the form of a traditional Chinese folding fan. This one is decorated with a clear winter night sky.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(holds)] [npc.her] fan coyly before [npc.her] face, ready to use it.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] waves [npc.her] fan at [npc2.name], grinning as the wave of arcane-infused sound hits [npc2.her] body!
Waving [npc.her] fan at [npc2.name], [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the arcane-infused pressure wave travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] waves at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] folding fan, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the arcane-infused pressure wave passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] waves [npc.her] folding fan at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Waving at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] folding fan, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] waves [npc.her] fan at [npc2.name], but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
